website_summaries.verdict: Softer than many of the other roll up keyboard models, this unit can roll up tighter than other models for increased portability.
pros: Slightly thinner exterior than some other models
Keyboard can roll up to fit in spaces where some keyboards cannot fit comfortably
Maintains the same flexible and portable features of other models, while also being easy to clean and waterproof
The keyboard is compatible with all commonly used operating systems, and offers the easy use of plug and play technology
cons: While the thinner material makes this unit very portable, it also means this unit may begin to lose shape faster than some other roll up keyboards

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard..too bad it didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this keyboard, not even the slightest sound while typing. Is a very good quality which exceeded my expectation honestly, for the price I wasn't hoping for such a good keyboard. Update: May 2018 - the keyboard died from natural causes - one key (T) stopped working long ago but the rest was still good, until is started to repeat keys and numbers messing up passwords and everything. is in the trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Andadaf

customer_reviews.title: Quiet as a mouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard because my mechanical one was way too loud for a sleeping baby. This makes no sound besides sight rubber bumping and it's barely audible. It's a little cumbersome to type on compared to my mechanical but I only use it when my child is asleep and then it rolls up perfectly into my desk drawer. It would be better with a black cord instead of a white cord for my personal set up.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Coolest keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this keyboard,It's made out of high quality silicon. It feels great,It has silent clicking which is a big benefit. Great price,Plug & Use right away,Bring it on the go. You can fold it,Roll it up & It doesn't take up a lot of space at all. Checkout my video
customer_reviews.author: Dr.JessicaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. It's good if you cant seem to not spill drink over your keyboard daily but this is hard to type on. It's almost as jankie as a glass keyboard. Love>like>decent>hate>vomit Ehh somewhere between decent and hate..im pretty neutral only because it was cheapish.
customer_reviews.author: SwagBrah

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Entire top row of letters and numpad did not function.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bureau

customer_reviews.title: No more noisy keystrokes at work & at home.
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard! I already have two: 1 for home use, and one for work use. No more noisy keystrokes. I'm gonna buy two more to put in my laptop bags not because I actually need them, but because of my OCD.
customer_reviews.author: Edsel.CM

customer_reviews.title: Works great in our dusty heavy equipment shop
customer_reviews.text: These work very well in our heavy equipment shop where there is a bunch of dust, the keys don't stick like regular keyboards in our shop. We have 6 computers out in the shop and these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Prill

customer_reviews.title: Saved my neck from spilling on the laptop!!
customer_reviews.text: I spilled sticky sugary coffee on my laptop keyboard. By chance, I saw this and ordered it and it is plugged into the USB and we've saved $$ on buying a new laptop!! Is waterproof and we put a clip board under the keys and over the laptop keys and it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Lansman

customer_reviews.title: but I still like it.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the keys are in odd locations or sizes, but that really can't be helped due because of what they're working with, and typing on it can at times feel weird, and I still am not used to the arrow key placements, but I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Der Kerl

customer_reviews.title: finicky
customer_reviews.text: many of the key have to be touched accurately in the middle and hard. It does seem to weather proof. However, its going in the junk pile.
customer_reviews.author: John Bissell

customer_reviews.title: Its cheap and it works
customer_reviews.text: Great workout for your fingers. Expect to have sore finger muscles after an hour or two. you will have to slow down and push the keys very deliberately but it does work and it is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and the asdf keys didn't work on either one. I had to return both of them.
customer_reviews.author: LazerBrenna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable to use, broke after 3 week of light use. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You have to push the keys really hard
customer_reviews.text: The keys won't type unless you push them real hard. Then on some you have to push over and over. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: ok...I guess
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable thing in the world and the durability was exceptionally poor.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: as a service Tech always need quality parts like this.
customer_reviews.text: Please with supplier , as a service Tech always need quality parts like this.
customer_reviews.author: DJ PHENOMENAL AJ

customer_reviews.title: Barely works...
customer_reviews.text: I literally have to mash my fingers just to get a letter or character to show. You can type a full sentence that has about 55 characters, and only 40 letters will show up. Terrible purchase, and a waste of money if I'm being honest.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Galloway

customer_reviews.title: received item
customer_reviews.text: omg this is 4 me quiet and water proof and works awesome
customer_reviews.author: merle

customer_reviews.title: Silent
customer_reviews.text: Completely silent. The only time sound is produced is when my fingers hit the desk underneath, but even that is being padded by the rubber of the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: click here
customer_reviews.text: product was as described , like the contrasting key colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Haven't tested out the waterproof feature but everything else is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: NinetailsKurama

customer_reviews.title: works well, and as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: the first time i received the keyboard, it was malfunctioning. i wrote the manufacturer who promptly sent out a replacement. high marks for excellent customer service! works well -- and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is good for ONE week and not BEYOND
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 weeks. Now majority of keys don't work or respond to press. Keyboard is totally useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some keys don't function
customer_reviews.text: keyboard had several keys which did not function on arrival
customer_reviews.author: Brent E Kitt

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It works great. After a few uses I found myself pressing the keys harder than usual to register the key being pressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylin Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard in the field until it is so durable and neat!!!
customer_reviews.author: 2focusedonlife

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking design
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Cool looking design, with quiet and effortless typing experience. Highly recommended for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all keys worked
customer_reviews.text: This product would be great if all the keys worked. I didn't use the product during the return period and when I pulled out the keyboard to use it for the first time several of the keys didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great little key board.
customer_reviews.text: this is a great key board. I bought for my Raspberry Pi 0. due to the fact that the computer is compact and very portable I wanted something the same for the key board. Keys work great and I have no issues with it being rolled up and un rolled. I also like that it is a full key board and full size unlike other portable key boards.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Works with raspberry pi
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and and handy... I keep it in my bookbag to use with my raspberry pi(s).
customer_reviews.author: S. McDonald

product_meta.title: BONUSIS Foldable Silicone Keyboard Flexible Keyboard Roll Up Keyboard USB Wired Soft Waterproof Silica Gel Computer Keyboard (103 Keys) for PC Laptop Notebook [Black]
feature_bullets: QWERTY KEYBOARD LAYOUT: Flexible, Soft, Foldable, Roll-up, Silent, Waterproof, Dustproof, Lightweight, Portable and easy to store. Multiple function make it an extraordinary computer keyboard.

SOFT SILICONE MATERIAL: Made of high intensity and high elasticity silicone gel, non-toxic and odorless. Flexible material allow you to fold it or roll up freely, very handy and convenient to take with notebook, laptop and mac.

WATERPROOF AND DUSTPROOF: No additional keyboard cover skin required, food crumbs or dust can be easily cleaned thoroughly. Clean the silicone keyboard with water, alcohol, or alcohol based disinfectant.
SIMPLE WIRED USB CONNECTION: Support main USB port, Plug and Use, Compatibility: Laptop, Notebook, Computer.

SILENT CLICK: Soft material allows discreet silent typing experience. No typing sound design makes you have a quiet working environment and avoid disturbing others. At night, it can keep your family have a good sleep and also keep you do work seriously.
